topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ac81fb6368721697040200#post_54ac81fb6368721697040200
Wakasagihime or Sekibanki or Kagerou.

They're just not as popular as Reimu or such.  Even some of the more notable characters don't get as much fanart; even Kasen or Hata No Kokoro don't get that much fanart in comparison and they're in the games.

You know how it is; all anyone ever wants to draw is the main characters.  Side characters and secondary characters need love too man.
